message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11500. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. I believe it's a fair deal considering its worth to you is $10000. Let me know if you're interested or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $10000. I believe this aligns more closely with my valuation of the product. I look forward to your response.
